text: praharaya ella kirimata pamini pirisa niwasiyantada paharadi athi bawayi apa warthakaru sadahan kale.
dan athi fon eka wate ethuna, thawa paya hayak yanakan meka eka digata charj wenna oona, man kiyanakan ekkenekwath mekata atha thiyanawa ehema nemeyi, thaththa widhayaka niyogayak dunna !
